CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 17, 1966, pg. 18 reads: "Playing With Children - While his wife prepares the evening meal, Glenn Freeman gets a kick out of playing with his two children, nine-year-old Glenn Albert, and two-and one-hale-year-old Dana. Like most youngsters, the Freeman children enjoy their portable backyard pool."
TitMainTitle: Glenn Freeman, crouching beside son, Glenn Albert, and daughter Dana, in backyard inflatable wading pool
